alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenwood; Laurens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:48PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Laurens, south central Greenville, southeastern Anderson, northeastern Abbeville and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 448 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Anderson, or near Biltmore Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belton, Honea Path, Ware Shoals, Due West, Donalds, Hodges, Shoals Junction, Princeton, Broadway Lake and Hickory Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Abbeville; Anderson; Greenwood; Laurens; Southern Greenville
